name: Mpho Molefe
about_me: Aspiring IT Technician, Software Developer and Cloud Enthusiast based in Gauteng and KwaZulu‑Natal, South Africa, with a strong focus on building practical, scalable solutions. Recently completed a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at Richfield Graduate Institute of Technology (2023–2025), combining academic foundations with real‑world industry experience.

During studies, developed strong skills in project planning, teamwork and software delivery, while earning certifications in Data Analytics Essentials (Cisco) and AWS Cloud Fundamentals. In 2025, completed an experiential learning internship at the Department of Correctional Services as a Student Intern (3 months - Help Desk Technician and  3 months - Junior Developer), supporting a large user base, maintaining networks and systems, and contributing to an internal social worker application using C#, .NET and SQL.

Beyond formal roles, worked with Qualtrix Software Technologies on an e‑hailing platform (Rydly) and built an ecommerce management platform (Ecommerce Connect), focusing on security, reliability, and real‑time user experiences. Preferred tools and technologies include Angular, ASP.NET, Node.js/Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS, Docker, Linux, and Git.

In free time, enjoy flying drones, exploring new visual perspectives, attending tech expos, diving into statistical analysis projects, and tinkering with mechanical and engineering concepts. Always open to collaborating, learning, and creating impactful digital products. Feel free to reach out via the Email or LinkedIn.
